name: Rocker Gun Holster Black and Gold
description:
Was €350 Now 175.00€!!!!

Attention social butterflies and party people! Wristlets, clutches, satchels, and purses are some of the greatest fun spoilers we know. Dancing is supposed to be carefree and fun. The rocker gun holster is the ultimate party bag. It adds spunk and a daring edge to any outfit.

MRJ’s hands-free bags are made from the finest Italian leather and guarantee a superb 100% made in Europe quality workmanship.

Contents:
- 2 internal zipped pockets
- 2 external pockets that cut across the front
- 6 gold studs across the shoulders
- 4 gold chains that drape along the back
- Lined with a black satin lining
- Finished with a gold colored leather piping that outlines the entire bag
- Made with genuine black Italian Nappa leather

Note: Also available with gold studs, gold chains, gold leather piping, and lined with a solid black satin lining.

- 2 Internal Zipped Pockets
- 2 External Pockets

Size:  Small

description:
Was €99 Now 49.50€!!!!

Besides being made out of 100% recycled denim, this bag can be worn as a vest but used as a bag. The bag is decorated with an orange corduroy finishing throughout the bag and yoke application on the back. 

- Light Denim
- 7 total pockets

Enough to store everything you need and more!

name: Denim Tangerine
description:
Was €99 Now 49.50€!!!!

Besides being made out of 100% recycled denim, this bag can be worn as a vest but used as a bag. The bag is decorated with an orange corduroy finishing throughout the bag and yoke application on the back. It has four zipped pockets, two internal and two external, and another four internal open pockets to store everything you need and more! It also has a chain application, a front zipper for a more comfortable fit along with three black straps across the front.

Size: Small/Medium

name: Button Up Velvet
description:
Was €99 Now 49.50€!!!!

This Black Button Up Velvet  bag is made with black velvet fabric and a blue cotton plaid lining. The bag is convenient for everyday use due to its  two good sized internal pockets that close with a zipper and two open internal pockets giving it a total of 4 pockets. The bag also contains a beautiful decorative flower on the back made with a mixture of the two fabrics and finished with four pearls for decoration.

It perfect to wear over a t-shirt, blouse, dress, jacket, or even coat in the wintertime. It is perfect for everyday wear, travelling, and even going out at night or to a casual party. Not only are the MRJ bags fashionable and can match almost any outfit, but they are extremely comfortable and practical at the same time.

name: Leather Bow Tie White and Pink
description:
MRJ has expanded into other extraordinary accessories.  MRJ's designer, Josephine Raffaella Magno is expanding her fascination with the finest italian leather and giving everyone a completely new view on the world of bow ties!

This bow tie is made from 100% italian leather and is used from the exact same quality leather from MRJ's classic edition.  It is lined with a cotton comic book pattern lining and finished with a pink leather piping.  It also contains two small golden chains in the middle that refine the bow tie.  The collar strap is also made of a cotton comic book pattern lining that closes with a velcro strap.

These ties were introduced to the world at MRJ's Suit Up Or Die fashion show in Vienna Austria on March 15th, 2013!

The neck size can range from 35cm to 42 cm (13.5 to 16.5 Inches) depending on the adjustment of the velcro strap.

name: Denim Bow Tie
description:
Was €30 Now 15€!!!!

MRJ has expanded into other extraordinary accessories.  MRJ's designer, Josephine Raffaella Magno is expanding her fascination with the finest italian leather and recycled materials while giving everyone a completely new view on the world of bow ties!

This bow tie is made from 100% recycled denim.  It is lined with the same blue recycled denim and finished with a silver leather piping.  It also contains six rhinestone studs that refine the bow tie.  The collar strap is also made from the same recycled denim that closes with a velcro strap.

These ties were introduced to the world at MRJ's Suit Up Or Die fashion show in Vienna Austria on March 15th, 2013!

The neck size can range from 35cm to 42 cm (13.5 to 16.5 Inches) depending on the adjustment of the velcro strap.

description:
Was €150 Now 75€!!!!

Smart-casual with an unconventional twist! It looks like a tie but it doesn’t knot like a tie, so it’s easy to put on and take off. This bag is mainly made for men, but surely any chick with a bold sense of style can pull it off too! 

MRJ’s hands-free bags are made from the finest Italian leather and guarantee a superb 100% made in Europe quality workmanship.

Contents:

- 3 internal slots for credit, I.D., and business cards.

name: Eco-Flower Power Denim Bag
description:
Besides being made out of 100% recycled denim, this bag can be worn as a vest but used as a bag. The bag is lined with a pink and white floral cotton fabric which compliments the vintage black denim. The bag is has a colorful beaded/nylon/ and cotton application on both shoulders that is by far the highlight of the entire bag. Chains braded with nylon and cotton drape along on the shoulders, front, and back of the bag and finished with a beautiful denim flower on the center back. This black jeans vest bag has 8 total pockets in order to provide for a large amount of space for all of your necessities. It also buttons in the front to provide for extra comfort.


Size: Small/Medium

name: Limited Edition Beaded Candy Bag (75% OFF)
description:
NOW ONLY 161.00€ / WAS 660€!!!!!

75% OFF!!

Save 499.00€

This exact bag is the original piece which was featured at the Vienna Fashion Week 2011 Rock and Dye runway and it is the first time it is being put up for sale.

Besides being made out of 100% recycled denim, this bag can be worn as a vest but used as a bag. The bag is lined with a classic black and flower cotton fabric which compliments the vintage blue denim. The bag is has a colorful beaded application on both shoulders that is by far the highlight of the entire bag. Chains drape along on the shoulders, front, and back of the bag and finished with a beautiful denim flower on the center back. This blue jeans vest bag has 6 total pockets in order to provide for a large amount of space for all of your necessities. It also buttons in the front to provide for extra comfort.


Size: Small/Medium

name: Denim Vest Bag
description:
The concept of hands free bags started in order to simplify travelling and everyday wear. Tired of having a purse always in your way and falling off when you're trying to get things done? This bag was made to simplify everything and to fit comfortably over your shoulders and equally distribute the weight but also act as a stylish accessory that will always turn heads. 


Besides being made out of 100% recycled denim, this bag can be worn as a vest but used as a bag. The bag is lined with a decorative multicolored black cotten  that makes an excellent contrast to the blue denim and finished with a pink nylon piping. This blue jeans vest bag has 6 total pockets in order to provide for a large amount of space for all of your necessities. Two pockets start from about chest height reaching the zipper as seen in the photo. Two more pockets are preserved from the denim pants that this bag once was (the rear of the original jeans). The final two pockets can be found in-between the other two external pockets and are fastened with a zipper for even more security. 

The bags are perfect to wear over a t-shirt, blouse, dress, jacket, or even coat for the wintertime, but also perfect for everyday wear, travelling, and even going out or clubbing. Not only are the MRJ bags fashionable and can match almost any outfit, but they are extremely comfortable and practical at the same time.

name: Scarf Bag Wool Pattern
description:
Was €50 Now €25!!!!

This Scarf bag is a perfect Accessory to have in your closet during the autumn/ winter season. Made with a brown striped wool, lined with a beige pattern cotton fabric which is also used to give the bag an extra touch of color as seen on picture.  It is also lined with beige leather piping and an vintage style metallic button to fasten the scarf closed. The Scarf bag has 2 side pockets which easily close with a zipper and one frontal marsupial pocket with two side openings easily accessible by both hands.  It’s practical and warm but also warms you up during the cold and windy days and can still manage to hold all of your necessities while travelling.

The bags are perfect to wear over a t-shirt, blouse, dress, jacket, or even coat for the wintertime, but also perfect for everyday wear, travelling, and even going out or clubbing.
